title: Spotted: Unite Co Billet is a UK-Made CNC-Machined and Laser Welded long travel 29er
content:
UK mountain bike component manufacturers, Unite Co, have announced plans for the production of a frame; the Unite Co Billet. The bike will be made in-house using what Unite Co say is a brand new manufacturing process that involves CNC machining and laser welding. Details are thin on the ground just now… here’s what we’ve

The post Spotted: Unite Co Billet is a UK-Made CNC-Machined and Laser Welded long travel 29er appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
